collectible.title: Wimpod
collectible.subtitle: No Wimpin' Out Now
collectible.text: I'll give ya this: you weren't that terrible. Take this, I see potential for ya to be a trainer. And don't laugh! Just 'cause Wimpod seems weak don't mean it can't grow up and kick ass! Wait until it becomes a Golisopod, then you'll see who's laughin'!
